statements: SELECT * FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance;
SELECT car_id, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance;
SELECT car_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT car_id, repair_history FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance ORDER BY next_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT car_id, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance WHERE next_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT car_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY next_maintenance_date
SELECT car_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, repair_history FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance WHERE repair_history IS NOT NULL
SELECT car_id, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM repair_history WHERE description LIKE '%brake%';
SELECT vehicle_id, repair_date FROM repair_history ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM repair_history WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS repair_count FROM repair_history GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING repair_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE mechanic_id = 101 ORDER BY car_id ASC;
SELECT car_id, brand, model, year FROM car_information WHERE year > 2015 AND status = 'Active';
SELECT car_id, repair_type, repair_description FROM repair_history WHERE repair_cost > 500 ORDER BY repair_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND cost < 100 ORDER BY schedule_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT car_id, schedule_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE mechanic_id = 123 AND cost > 100 ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT car_id, brand, model, year FROM car_information WHERE year >= 2015 AND status = 'Active' ORDER BY brand, model;
SELECT car_id, repair_date, repair_type, repair_cost FROM repair_history WHERE repair_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT car_id, brand, current_mileage FROM car_information WHERE brand = 'Toyota' AND current_mileage < 50000 ORDER BY current_mileage DESC, brand ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, schedule_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE completed = FALSE;
SELECT technician, cost FROM repair_history WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01' AND completion_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT repair_type, completion_date FROM repair_history WHERE cost > 500.00 ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT car_id, repair_type FROM repair_schedule WHERE completed = TRUE AND repair_type LIKE '%engine%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE completed = TRUE ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, schedule_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND completed = FALSE ORDER BY schedule_date ASC
SELECT car_id, maintenance_type, schedule_date, technician FROM maintenance_history WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT repair_type, cost FROM repair_history WHERE technician = 'John Doe' AND completion_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY completion_date
SELECT car_id, repair_type FROM repair_schedule WHERE completed = TRUE AND schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY car_id
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT fleet_name, fleet_size FROM fleet ORDER BY fleet_size DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT repair_id, vehicle_id, repair_date, repair_description FROM repair_history WHERE repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT fleet_name, fleet_size FROM fleet WHERE fleet_size >= 50;
SELECT location_id, vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0 ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC;
